thread.section_title: MiniInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 MiniInTheBox 的点评意见 | miniinthebox.com
thread.title: yaseen dollie
thread.title_full: MiniInTheBox 的点评人 yaseen dollie

author: yaseen dollie
title: yaseen dollie
text: When I was first introduced to MiniInTheBox I was sceptical. When I first ordered some items, it took longer than the estimated date. However the helpful support team ensured me that my order was on its way. I was really surprised to find that the orders were of higher quality than expected. I didn't expect much since the price was so unbelievably low, but I'm glad that I got something very usable. I would recommend MiniInTheBox to anyone who needs some good products for good prices.
